thread.title: ALAIN HARVEY
thread.title_full: Brushy Mountain Bee Farm reviewed by ALAIN HARVEY

author: ALAIN HARVEY
title: ALAIN HARVEY
text: The service representative was authentic, knowledgeable and extremely helpful. My order arrived securely packed and in a timely manner. I would not hesitate to do business with Brushy Mountain Bee Farm in the future. Highly recommended.
